ISSUE.TITLE: Increased Blog functionality
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: 1. There is no way to preview a blog post. 2. The blog is not included in the sitemap.xml. 3. The blog is not included in a site search. 4. There should be an option to show blog summaries on the home page (like the news). 5. Blog images are not handled the same way other images are. Source: http://www.nopcommerce.com/boards/t/36820/blog-is-lacking.aspx Metablog support - http://outcoldman.ru/ru/blog/show/229 Pingback, trackback support etc

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #6 Cleanup Comment Reformating Update .gitignore and enhance FPTCatalogModelFactory Updated .gitignore to include new paths and files, and reordered an entry. In FPTCatalogModelFactory, commented out unused fields, improved product name processing by adding logic for "Condition" and "Centering" attributes, moved and made StripHtmlTags static, reformatted RemoveAllBeforeWord, and added GetProductSpecificationAttributesAsync method.

#6 Refactor product model factories and update templates - Added a new div in `ProductTemplate.Simple.cshtml` to display a message about the stamp image. - Removed unused `using` directives in `FlexCatalogModelFactory.cs` and added necessary ones. - Introduced a new private field `_flexProductModelFactory` in `FlexCatalogModelFactory`. - Modified the constructor of `FlexCatalogModelFactory` to accept `FlexProductModelFactory` as a parameter and initialized the new field. - Replaced the call to `PrepareCatalogProductsAsync` with `FlexPrepareCatalogProductsModelAsync` in `FlexCatalogModelFactory`. - Updated the method `FlexPrepareCatalogProductsModelAsync` to use `FlexPrepareProductOverviewModelsAsync` from `FlexProductModelFactory`. - Changed the method `IsIncludedCategoryAsync` in `FlexProductModelFactory` to accept a `Category` parameter and simplified its logic. - Commented out the registration of `IProductModelFactory` with `FlexProductModelFactory` in `PluginNopStartup.cs` and added a scoped registration for `FlexProductModelFactory`. - Removed an unused private method `Fixed2WordStateNames` from `StateDuckStampNameService.cs`. - Added comments and region tags for better code organization and readability.
